#include <iostream>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

int fast_exp(int n, int r){
	if(r == 0 || n == 1)
		return 1;
	else{
		int temp = fast_exp(n, r/2);
		temp = (temp * temp)%1000;
		if(r % 2 != 0)
			temp = (temp * n)%1000;
		return temp;
	}
}

int main(){
	int T, H;
	cin >> T;
	while(T--){
		cin >> H;
		cout << fast_exp(2, H-1) << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
